level.heading: Transfer of official personnel folders.
level.text: The system for the maintenance of the official personnel folder established under § 1-631.01 shall provide for the transfer of folders between agencies of the District government subject to this chapter when employees transfer from 1 agency to another.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-139, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-601.01.
